sense.def:
Kadar nekaj rečemo
point-blank
, tisto povemo zelo odkrito, brez pojasnjevanja ali opravičevanja.

seg.quote: She asked him point-blank if I was with him on Saturday.
...a point-blank refusal to discuss the matter.

sense.def:
Streljati na nekoga ali nekaj
point-blank
pomeni streljati tako, da se cev orožja dotika osebe ali stvari ali da ji je zelo blizu.

seg.quote: He shot him in the brain, point-blank.
